title: debugger breakpoint (as in IE) using Visual Studio with the statement "debugger"
body: Could you please make as IE and Visual Studio, where you set in javascript the "debugger" word and then when I run the debugger I get a nice stop into that script. This would be such a great and useful feature...

comments.body: Would recommend really learning the developer tools in the browser over relying on a hook between Edge & VS. For one, most likely, it will most likely only work in edge and two there is so much you can do with the browser developer tools that it really pays off in the long run. Granted i don't know how good the developer tools are for edge because i always use chrome but i would think they would have to be close in functionality.
